body_html: I would drop the requirement of having at least one coach to have a confirmed team. Pure pragmatic reasons: a confirmed team should be able to create an application draft. They can start filling out their stuff without having to wait for a coach to hop on (they may still be in the process of finding any).

body: I would drop the requirement of having at least one coach to have a `confirmed` team. Pure pragmatic reasons: a confirmed team should be able to create an application draft. They can start filling out their stuff without having to wait for a coach to hop on (they may still be in the process of finding any).
